code: import axios from"axios";export default class PostService{static async getAll(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:10;let page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;const response=await axios.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts',{params:{_limit:limit,_page:page}});return response;}static async getById(id){const response=await axios.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/'+id);return response;}static async getComments(id){const response=await axios.get("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/".concat(id,"/comments"));return response;}}
